leg.name: Squats
leg.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and lower your hips back and down.

leg.name: Lunges
leg.instructions: Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees.

leg.name: Jumping Jacks
leg.instructions: Jump to a position with legs spread and hands overhead, then return to the starting position.

leg.name: Calf Raises
leg.instructions: Stand on the edge of a step, rise onto your toes, and slowly lower back down.

leg.name: Glute Bridges
leg.instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and lift your hips towards the ceiling.

leg.name: Wall Sit
leg.instructions: Lean against a wall and slide down until your thighs are parallel to the ground.

leg.name: Step-Ups
leg.instructions: Step up onto a bench or chair and then step back down.

leg.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
leg.instructions: Place one foot behind you on a bench and lower your front leg into a squat.

leg.name: Sumo Squats
leg.instructions: Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width apart and squat while keeping your knees over your toes.

leg.name: Donkey Kicks
leg.instructions: On all fours, kick one leg up towards the ceiling, keeping the knee bent.

leg.name: Side Lunges
leg.instructions: Step to the side and lower your hips while keeping your other leg straight.

leg.name: Pistol Squats
leg.instructions: Perform a squat on one leg while the other leg is extended forward.

leg.name: Single-Leg Deadlifts
leg.instructions: Stand on one leg, bend forward at the waist, and lower your torso while extending your other leg back.

leg.name: Curtsy Lunges
leg.instructions: Step one leg behind and across your body as if you were curtsying.

leg.name: Frog Jumps
leg.instructions: Jump forward, landing in a deep squat, and then jump again.

leg.name: High Knees
leg.instructions: Run in place while lifting your knees as high as possible.

leg.name: Broad Jumps
leg.instructions: Jump forward as far as you can from a standing position, landing softly.

leg.name: Box Jumps
leg.instructions: Jump from the ground onto a sturdy box or bench, landing with both feet.

leg.name: Reverse Lunges
leg.instructions: Step backward into a lunge, then return to standing position.

leg.name: Mountain Climbers
leg.instructions: In a plank position, alternate bringing your knees to your chest as if you're running in place.
